entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
